WOODCARB3
  • Home
  • Reference

Total carbon placed in use in od tons of wood fiber

Corresponds to B3147 column in SW Calc P and SW Calc spreadsheet for Production and Stock Change approach respectively.

calcplacediu(Years = 1900:2020, approach = c("Production", "Stock Change"),
  total = TRUE)

Arguments

Years
years to calculate carbon placed in use for
approach
The approach type to use. Fractions dont change but inflow does
total
Whether to return total placed in use or seperate it by end uses.

Value

a data frame of carbon placed in use for various end uses

Examples

calcplacediu()
#>   [1] 56835323 58780354 60800014 63060756 64944951 66023225 70843577 75460302
